China's military lashes out at US after breakthrough talksChina's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:50:14 GMT UJEWN6HLKFODRG32LXNKQXTRJU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-military-lashes-out-us-after-breakthrough-talks-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界
Gold climbs to over three-week high on US rate cuts betsGold prices steadied after hitting a more than three-week peak on Thursday, deriving support from a weaker U.S. dollar and bond yields as markets wager on rate cuts by the Federal Reserve early next year. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:22:05 GMT BRFI2CRK4ZP6DNDH345SFZQX4A https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/gold-climbs-over-third-week-high-us-rate-cuts-bets-2023-12-28/Hissay Bhutia市场商品
China aims to build more than half the world's cleaner-fuel ships by 2025China has set itself the goal of producing more than half of the world's ships powered by cleaner fuels by 2025, in guidelines published by the industry ministry on Thursday. Ronaldo's Al-Nassr set for all-Saudi showdown in Asian Champions LeagueCristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr will face fellow Saudi Pro League side Al-Fayha in the last 16 of the Asian Champions League with four-times winners Al-Hilal due to take on Iran's Sepahan when the continental club championship returns in February. China says it won't turn a blind eye to Philippines' repeated 'provocations'China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea. China urges nationals to leave north Myanmar region amid unrestChina's embassy in Myanmar urged its nationals on Thursday to leave the Laukkai area in Kokang region in northern Myanmar as soon as possible, citing growing security risks.
